Package com.cafean.CalcServer.util

Class ThreadedScreenReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.cafean.CalcServer.util.ThreadedScreenReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ThreadedScreenReader
extends java.lang.Thread
    A thread that reads the STDOUT and STDERR streams of a process and echos it to an output file.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadedScreenReader

        public ThreadedScreenReader​(java.lang.Process process,
                            java.io.File outFile,
                            AbstractLoggable logger)
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Creates a new screen reader for the given process to write its STDOUT and STDERR streams to the given output file.
        Parameters:
        process - the Process from which to read STDERR and STDOUT
        outFile - the File to which to write the output and error streams
        logger - the Logger to send error messages to
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
